body: Yep I have to fix the comment, but the API change was intentional. The API is currently bad in that `add_parameters()` is called in the constructor of `Optimizer`, but inheritance doesn't work in constructors.
body_html: Yep I have to fix the comment, but the API change was intentional. The API is currently bad in that add_parameters() is called in the constructor of Optimizer, but inheritance doesn't work in constructors.
